# Language Reference

> Documentation for Language Reference.

- [Attributes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/attributes.md): Learn more about: Attributes (Visual Basic)
- [Select the Visual Basic language version](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/configure-language-version.md): Configure the compiler to perform syntax validation using a specific compiler version.
- [Constants and Enumerations (Visual Basic)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/constants-and-enumerations.md): Learn more about: Constants and Enumerations (Visual Basic)
- [Language Reference](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/index.md): Learn more about: Visual Basic Language Reference
- [Modules](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/modules.md): Learn more about: Modules (Visual Basic)
- [Nothing keyword](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/nothing.md): Learn more about: Nothing keyword (Visual Basic)
- [Properties](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/properties.md): Learn more about: Properties (Visual Basic)
- [Runtime Library Members](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/runtime-library-members.md): Learn more about: Visual Basic Runtime Library Members
- [Typographic and Code Conventions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/typographic-and-code-conventions.md): Learn more about: Typographic and Code Conventions (Visual Basic)

## Subtopics
